description: Try our easy to follow Moroccan Lentil Soup recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Soup,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Winter,Halal,Vegetarian,Tomato,Cauliflower,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Moroccan Lentil Soup Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a large saucepan over low heat. Add onion, garlic, celery and carrot and cook, stirring often, for 10 minutes. Add cauliflower and ground spices and cook, stirring, for 2 minutes or until fragrant and cauliflower is well coated in spices.
Stir in harissa, tomato, lentils and stock. Bring to the boil over medium heat, then reduce to low heat and simmer for 30 minutes or until lentils are tender. Stir through coriander and lemon juice.
